thread.title: 'I won't be back': Terminator Genisys 2 reportedly put on indefinite hold - Movies
thread.title_full: 'I won't be back': Terminator Genisys 2 reportedly put on indefinite hold - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Ali Plumb
title: 'I won't be back': Terminator Genisys 2 reportedly put on indefinite hold - Movies
text: It was off, it was on again, but now it's off again. Terminator Genisys 2 has reportedly been put on hold by studio Paramount after further analysis of the numbers.Panned by the critics and mostly ignored by Western cinemagoers, the chances of a sequel were improved by a decent box office haul in China - but it appears this wasn't enough to revive the franchise. © ParamountArnold Schwarzenegger, Jai Courtney and Emilia Clarke in this year's Terminator Genisys Hidden in a movie finance piece from Hollywood Reporter, it emerges that despite earning $440 million worldwide, the $155 million sci-fi will still lose money.This is reportedly because of big post-production costs, including a gigantic press campaign. © Paramount According to the magazine's sources, this means "the notion of a Terminator universe [has been put] on hold indefinitely", which means Arnold Schwarzenegger won't be playing the T-800 any time soon.That said, you can see the infamous killer robot in the new WWE 2K16 wrestling game, and Arnie is keeping himself busy as the new host of the American Apprentice.Watch the Terminator Genisys trailer below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
